dict.acceptation: 成直角的；平方的；（尤指在生意上）公平的；正方形的；
四四方方地；成直角地；正直地；坚定地；
使成正方形；使成直角；检测…的角度；调整，改正；

sent.orig: The result was analyzed statistically by X2 (chi-square test) to compare the difference between two nationalities.
sent.trans: 用X~2检验(chi-square test)比较两个民族基因频率分布的差别，用Woof公式计算比数比(odds ratio,OR)和95％可信限(confidence interval,C.I.) 。

sent.orig: Area 237 square kilometer, program area 1127 square kilometer, urban building area 40 square kilometer.
sent.trans: 面积237平方公里，规划总面积1127平方公里，市区建成面积40平方公里。

sent.orig: Anna: Leicester Square. Yes, this is Leicester Square.
sent.trans: 安娜：莱斯特广场。是的，这里是莱斯特广场。

sent.orig: From north to south Square followed by municipal Square, and historical and cultural promenade, sculpture plaza.
sent.trans: 广场自北往南依次为市政广场、历史文化长廊、雕塑广场。

sent.orig: Many schools teach square dancing in Physical Education, and there are actually square dance competitions.
sent.trans: 许多学校教在体育的方块舞，并且实际上有方块舞竞争。
